entry.source: I want to leave Shinjuku and make Ikebukuro{F801}my new base of operations. A city free from{F801}the Ashura-kai sounds like Heaven! But I want{F801}to know what kind of place Ikebukuro is. Please{F801}take two {F804,5}pictures{F804,0} for me: of the {F804,5}really tall{F801}building{F804,0} and of the {F804,5}train station east gate.{F804,0}{F801}Once you've got those pictures, come see me.{F801}I'll be near Shinjuku's west gate.{F801}
